trans-unit.source: Represents a viewport for a paginated <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 代表已編頁的檢視區<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Arranges the content to fit a specified view size.
trans-unit.target: 排列內容，以符合指定的檢視大小。

trans-unit.source: The returned size will always be less than or equal to the specified `finalSize`.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的大小一定會小於或等於指定`finalSize`。

trans-unit.source: The maximum size that the page view should use to arrange itself and its children.
trans-unit.target: 頁面檢視應該用來排列本身和其子系的大小上限。

trans-unit.source: The actual size that the page view used to arrange itself and its children.
trans-unit.target: 用來排列本身和其子系的頁面檢視實際大小。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的資源全部釋出<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose after finished using each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> instance.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 Dispose 之後完成使用每個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView>執行個體。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView>

trans-unit.source: After Dispose is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> is released for garbage collection and should no longer be referenced by the application.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 Dispose 之後，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView>釋放回收和應用程式應該不會再參考。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose and being released, the garbage collector can reclaim the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> memory and resources.
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收行程可以回收之後呼叫 Dispose 和被釋放，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView>記憶體和資源。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose as the final call to release each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> instance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 永遠呼叫為每個版本最後呼叫 Dispose<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView>執行個體。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView>

trans-unit.source: If Dispose is not called, the resources the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> is using will not be freed until the garbage collector later calls the page viewer's <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果處置不呼叫時，資源<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView>是使用將不會釋放記憶體回收行程稍後呼叫網頁檢視器之前<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage"></xref> associated with this view.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage"></xref>這份檢視相關聯。

trans-unit.source: The document page associated with this view.
trans-unit.target: 此檢視相關聯的文件頁面。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"></xref> used to retrieve content pages for this view.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"></xref>用來擷取此檢視的內容頁面。

trans-unit.source: The paginator that retrieves content pages for this view.
trans-unit.target: 擷取這個檢視的內容頁面的分頁符號。

trans-unit.source: Gets the service object of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之型別的服務物件。

trans-unit.source: GetService returns any services that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.DocumentPaginator%2A> provides if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.DocumentPaginator%2A> implements <xref:System.IServiceProvider>.
trans-unit.target: GetService 傳回任何服務<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.DocumentPaginator%2A>如果提供的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.DocumentPaginator%2A>實作<xref:System.IServiceProvider>.</xref:System.IServiceProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.DocumentPaginator%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.DocumentPaginator%2A>

trans-unit.source: The type of service object to get.
trans-unit.target: 要取得之服務物件類型。

trans-unit.source: A service object of type serviceType, or if there is no service object of type serviceType.
trans-unit.target: 型別的服務物件 serviceType ，或型別的服務物件是否 serviceType 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> child at a specified index.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>指定索引處的子系。

trans-unit.source: `index` must be between 0 and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.VisualChildrenCount%2A>-1.
trans-unit.target: `index`必須介於 0 和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.VisualChildrenCount%2A>-1。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.VisualChildrenCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the visual child to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回的視覺化子系的索引。

trans-unit.source: The visual child at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 指定索引處 visual 的子系。

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero, or greater than or equal to .
trans-unit.target: index小於零，或大於或等於。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Dispose*> has been called for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Dispose*>已經對這個執行個體呼叫。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Dispose*> has been called for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Dispose*>已經對這個呼叫<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView"> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the available viewport size that can be given to display the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.DocumentPage*>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回可以提供用來顯示目前<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.DocumentPage*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.DocumentPage*>可用的檢視區大小

trans-unit.source: The returned size is always equal to or less than the given `availableSize`.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的大小一律是等於或小於比指定`availableSize`。

trans-unit.source: The maximum available size.
trans-unit.target: 可用的大小上限。

trans-unit.source: The actual desired size.
trans-unit.target: 實際需要的大小。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>這個<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentPageViewAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentPageViewAutomationPeer"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Invoked when the DPI setting for the document page view is changed.
trans-unit.target: 叫用的文件頁面檢視的 DPI 設定變更時。

trans-unit.source: The available size that the parent can give to the child.
trans-unit.target: 提供給子項目父代可以使用的大小。

trans-unit.source: This is soft constraint.
trans-unit.target: 這是選擇性的條件約束。

trans-unit.source: The DocumentPageView's desired size.
trans-unit.target: DocumentPageView 所需的大小。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> element of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.DocumentPage*> is connected.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>元素<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.DocumentPage*>連接。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.DocumentPage*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> element of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.DocumentPage*> is disconnected.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>元素<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.DocumentPage*>已中斷連接。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.DocumentPage*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the page number of the current page displayed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前顯示之頁面的頁碼。

trans-unit.source: PageNumber is zero-based: 0 is the first page, 1 is the second page, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始 PageNumber: 0 是第一頁，1 是第二個頁面上，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: No content is displayed if PageNumber is set to a negative number.
trans-unit.target: 如果 PageNumber 設為負數，會不顯示任何內容。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`||

trans-unit.source: The zero-based page number of the current page displayed.
trans-unit.target: 目前顯示的頁面以零為起始的頁碼。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.PageNumber*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.PageNumber*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.PageNumber*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Stretch"></xref> enumeration that specifies how content should be stretched to fill the display page.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Stretch"></xref>列舉，指定如何內容自動縮放以填滿顯示頁面。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`||

trans-unit.source: The enumeration value that specifies how content should be stretched to fill the display page.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值，指定如何內容自動縮放以填滿顯示頁面。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Stretch"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Stretch"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StretchDirection"></xref> enumeration that specifies in what scaling directions <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Stretch*> should be applied.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StretchDirection"></xref>列舉，指定哪些調整方向<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Stretch*>應套用。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Stretch*>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`||

trans-unit.source: The enumeration value that specifies in what scaling directions <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Stretch*> should be applied.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值，指定哪些調整方向<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Stretch*>應套用。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Stretch*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StretchDirection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StretchDirection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.StretchDirection*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.StretchDirection*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.StretchDirection*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Stretch*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Stretch*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Stretch*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此成員支援[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]基礎結構，不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: Use the type-safe <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Dispose*> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 使用型別安全<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Dispose*>方法而。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此成員支援[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]基礎結構，不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: Use the type-safe <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.GetService*> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 使用型別安全<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.GetService*>方法而。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.GetService*>

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies the type of service object to get.
trans-unit.target: 物件，指定要取得之服務物件類型。

trans-unit.source: A service object of type serviceType.
trans-unit.target: 型別的服務物件 serviceType 。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of visual children contained in this view.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個檢視中所含的視覺化子系數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of visual children contained in this view.
trans-unit.target: 這個檢視中所含的視覺化子系數目。
